short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fable brings a collaboration dashboard to your team on every page of the internet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create an account at ‚áí https://onfable.typeform.com/to/wRXNwwzo

‚ö°Ô∏èFable‚Äôs mission is to enable collaboration at the speed of thought. We‚Äôre building an experience crafted to help you communicate as fast you think. Built ground up for collaborative people - founders, operators, marketers, designers, students and more - experience a new way to share and receive contextual information. 

Fable turns every webpage into Google Docs and allows you to leave contextual comments on any website for you and your team. All your information is at your fingertips with the press of key - access your collaboration dashboard from any website and never leave your flow state. Leave comments and thoughts directly on a webpage for yourself and team to interact with directly.

------------------------------------------

üî•Fable Hotkeys: Alt + 

Alt +  C ‚áí leave a comment/highlight text

Alt +  T ‚áí toggle your teams

Alt +  P ‚áí toggle your projects

Alt +  O ‚áí toggle your dashboard

------------------------------------------

üöÄ Fable allows you to work together on:

1. Product and design feedback - async website and landing page feedback and reviews, UX/UI design reviews etc.

2. Research Projects - Market research, competitive analysis, trend analysis etc.

4. Operations - User onboarding, QA testing, bug reports, copyrighting etc.

5. Breadcrumbs & Memory markers - reminders on people to reach out to, interesting articles and newsletter tidbits, memes, videos, images and more!

6. Contextual knowledge transfer - let your teammates know exactly what you want them to see and where all by pressing the C key.
